main.description: Official Everwell Hub patient management platform

ProductOverview.Summary: The Everwell Hub is a best in-class patient management platform designed for high-burden public healthcare programs globally.
ProductOverview.Description: The Everwell Hub supports the entire digital cascade of care from diagnosis through treatment support and completion, including fully integrated modules for diagnostics (both lab-generated results and AI diagnostic solutions), digital adherence technologies, virtual care and patient engagement, and digital payments.
ProductOverview.PrimaryFunctionality: Patient management platform with integrated modules for diagnostics, digital adherence, virtual care, patient engagement, and digital payments
ProductOverview.Users: Healthcare providers, public health programs, government health systems, NGOs working in high-burden disease areas

Reach.SummaryOfReach: The Everwell Hub supports more than 2.4 million cases per year, is used by over 400,000 health care providers, is deployed in over 17 countries, and is adapted for four different public health diseases. The citizen-facing app has over 350,000 downloads, and $350 million has been transferred by way of social benefits to TB citizens in India. Everwell developed Ni-kshay, the national TB case management platform for India, which has enrolled over 14 million patients to-date, making it the largest case management platform for TB in the world.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: All maturity model assessments are self-reported by the funded organization leading the development of the global good.
